thread.title: Michelle Edmonds

author: Michelle Edmonds
title: Michelle Edmonds
text: I went online and was called by Jeff Peck I explained I was at work and I gave basic information. Jeff responded later with an email which was great when you have a "no phones on the floor job", he did follow up with a phone message a day later. I already had an appointment with lifesaver but I called Jeff back a few days later to compare companies. I was sold on intoxalock when Jeff waited patiently on the line while I took my dog Annabelle out I provided the info I knew and we finished up back at the house. Jeff thank you, I've made many mistakes in my life but you in no way made me feel less human for this one.
